name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-confirmation-dialog-component
title: Confirmation Dialog Component
shortDescription: The Confirmation Dialog is a reusable Canvas Component that provides a modal, app-wide confirmation experience for Power Apps.
longDescription: The Confirmation Dialog is a reusable Canvas Component that displays a centered dialog with a customizable title, message, and configurable Confirm and Cancel buttons. The component supports destructiveâ€‘action styling (highlighting the confirm button in red), optional button icons, and exposes OnConfirm and OnCancel events for app logic integration. This makes it ideal for consistent, accessible confirmation prompts across your app without rewriting the UI each time.
